summary: WHILE MAKING A LEFT TURN ONTO A MAJOR HIGHWAY THE DRIVE SHAFT FELL OUT/OFF THE TRUCK; CAUSING THE TRUCK TO STOP DEAD IN THE ROAD.  TRUCK HAD TO BE TOWED TO A SHOP TO BE FIXED.      TRUCK WAS FIXED IN APRIL 2013.  I WAS JUST NOTIFIED VIA RECALL NOTICE P77 / NHTSA 14V-796.  WILL FILE FOR REIMBURSEMENT TO AUBURN MI. ADDRESS PROVIDED.   *TR
